name: MishiPay
description:
MishiPay's technology allows in-store shoppers to pick up a product, scan the barcode with their phone, pay with their phone and simply walk out with it or choose home delivery. It provides a fully theft-proof scan, pay and leave solution that completely eliminates queuing in retail and bridges online and offline into an Omni-channel experience.  

After our highly successful first stage trials at The Dandy Lab in Spitalfields Market, London (http://thedandylab.com/) and go-live on the app store (https://appsto.re/gb/a2DE_.i). On the back of this, we have got a partnership with Cisco who have championed and sponsored us into IDEALondon (http://www.idea-london.co.uk/).

We are now working towards Proof of Concepts with some of the biggest retailers around the world and are thus looking to raise our seed round, expand our team and go to the next stage of development.

jobs.title: Excellent opportunity for React Developers to work with fastest growing start-up
jobs.description:
Senior React Native+React JS Developer - Leading Edge Retail Tech!

MishiPay

Central Bangalore

Excellent salary plus bonus

We are MishiPay, a ground-breaking retail tech startup changing the way people shop by bringing the best of the online experience into physical stores. 

Our technology allows in-store shoppers to pick up a product, scan it with their phone, receive enriched product information, pay directly in the app and simply walk out once payment is complete. For RFID enabled retailers, the act of paying automatically deactivates the security on each purchased item. For non RFID enabled retailers, we offer a quick scan solution to ensure a secure shopping experience for both the customer and the retailer.

We work with Europe’s largest retailers including Mango, Decathlon, MediaMarktSaturn, Dixons and others. We are looking for a talented ReactNative+React JS developers with at least 3 years of commercial experience (essential) wanting to grasp user needs and solve problems in a fast-growing, consumer tech startup. Ultimately, you will make our products more user-friendly and intuitive to attract and retain customers.

This is a senior role within a growing startup and as such, you'll hit the ground running. We expect you to make an impact quickly!

Job Title: ReactNative+React JS developer

Responsibilities

Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.

Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms.

Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.

Reach out to the open source community to encourage and help implement mission-critical software fixes.

Maintain code and write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality.

Work on existing React Native apps and help in transitioning them to React web apps.

Should be able to take initiatives and ownership and build the dashboard from scratch.

Skills:
Experienced in React Native, React JS and Redux, a start-up experience is a must.

Knowledge of functional and object-oriented programming

Ability to write well-documented, clean Javascript code

Rock solid at working with third-party dependencies and debugging dependency conflicts

Familiarity with native build tools like XCode and Android Studio, along with a basic understanding of Cocoapods, Gradle and NPM.

Understanding of REST APIs and offline storage

jobs.title: Hiring Director of Front-end for a London based start-up
jobs.description:
Front-end development Lead - Game-changing retail technology!

MishiPay

Central Bangalore

Excellent salary plus bonus

We are MishiPay, a ground-breaking retail tech startup changing the way people shop by bringing the best of the online experience into physical stores. Our technology allows in-store shoppers to pick up a product, scan it with their phone, receive enriched product information, pay directly in the app and simply walk out once payment is complete. We then ensure security against theft via RFID or via the use of the Mishipay dashboard for the staff, guided by our unique risk-engine.

We work with Europe’s largest retailers including Mango, MediaMarktSaturn, Decathlon, and others. We are looking for a talented Front-End Developer wanting to grasp user needs and solve problems in a fast-growing, consumer tech startup. Ultimately, you will make our products more user-friendly and intuitive to attract and retain customers, while creating new features for enhancing the shopper journey. As the role is for a Director level, you need to be ready to lead our existing team of talented developers, hand-picked to build the products for each of their platforms of iOS, Android and Web.

 

Technical Skills Required:

Experience creating native iOS and Android applications which have been released on the App Store and Play Store.

Experience with modern front-end Javascript frameworks such as Angular 2 and above, and Reactjs well as jQuery library.

Expertise in some of the following additional development tools: Node.js, CSS preprocessors, REST API, Git.

Expert at translating complex designs into lean, compliant and responsive code.

Highly experienced at creating documentation and standards and holding an organization accountable to these standards.

Highly experienced with validation and QA processes associated with front-end development

Experience working in Agile/Scrum/Kanban and Waterfall SDLC with knowledge of project management and collaboration tools like JIRA, Slack

Experience with the SDK, Bootstrap framework.

Supervisory Responsibilities:

Directly manage a team of 4 or more FE developers.

Take responsibility on deadlines for all Mishipay and Partner apps on iOS, Android and Web.

Responsibility to deploy client projects and discuss architecture with Back-end, Architecture and Security teams.

Report to CTO and the remaining Executive Committee every month.

Develop new Product Roadmap together with the Director of Product and other senior executives.

Assign budgets and resources to items on Product Roadmap and separate client deliveries required in parallel.

Minimum Qualifications:

Bachelor's Degree in computer science or equivalent, relevant experience.

6+ years' experience in software development.

Ability to engage diverse senior stakeholders and drive consensus quickly.

Demonstrated experience with mobile first and responsive design.

Excellent communication skills demonstrated an interest in continued education, and the ability to thrive when facing unexpected and/or tasks.

Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills.

jobs.title: Hiring Senior Backend Developers for Game-changing retail tech start-up
jobs.description:
Senior Backend Developer- Game-changing retail technology!

MishiPay

Central Bangalore

Excellent salary plus bonus

Want to be part of an exciting tech startup redefining the retail industry as we know it? Are you a talented BackEnd Software Engineer with experience in Python and Django? If so, we’d love to hear from you!

We’re looking for someone who is passionate about technology, who loves learning and new challenges.  You’ll play a key part in the development of our products, help to evolve and streamline our tech stack to suit our needs as we grow, and you’ll enjoy working in an environment surrounded by like-minded inspirational individuals.   

About the Role

You will own the back-end development for one or more of our products and collaborate with visual/interaction designers and other engineers to launch new products, iterate on existing features, and build a world-class user experience.
You will implement cutting-edge technologies and will be writing state-of-the-art code to keep MishiPay at the helm of current technology. You’ll help to build and deliver a scalable, robust, world-class application, that is innovative, ground-breaking, delightful, secure, accessible and integrates with third-party retail software.
About You:

3-6 years of extensive experience in Python, Django and Web Services, start-up experience is a plus
Experience designing and delivering large scale web services over Django or other similar web server platforms.
Experience working with REST, SOAP XML interfaces
Experience integrating with 3rd party platforms
Experience building APIs from scratch
Experience with PostgreSQL, Redis
Experience with and has a passion for data and building platforms with strong Object Oriented Skills.
You should have a solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms and software design. 
Able to take individual ownership of a project from start to finish.
B.E/B.Tech in Computer Science or related technical discipline (or equivalent).

Why MishiPay?

You’ll work with a truly global, multi-cultural team who are striving to make MishiPay redefine the retail industry globally!! You’ll get to work with some super-talented individuals and receive on-the-job pitch training, to help you become a key influencer with our high profile technology and retail partners.

MishiPay's patent-pending technology allows in-store shoppers to scan the barcode of any product with their phone, pay within the phone and simply walk out with the item. We also integrate completely into existing systems of retailers and ensure security against theft through our technology, so we essentially provide every store with the Amazon Go experience at only a fraction of the cost.

If you think you’ve got what it takes, then tell us more about you!
